show.title: Cursed by Love
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/tHQg6N
show.description: Vaishnavi, a devoted woman, faces heartbreak when her husband betrays and abandons her. But beneath her sorrow lies a shocking truth she is a wealthy heir and a genius ready to reclaim her power. As she rises from humiliation, fate brings her to Vikranth Desai, a commanding CEO who treats her with unmatched devotion. Unlike her cruel past, he showers her with love and respect, standing by her side as she exposes enemies and seeks justice.
show.description_secondary: Vaishnavi, a devoted woman, faces heartbreak when her husband betrays and abandons her.
